message: I'm excited to offer you this great product! I think you'll really love it.
Thanks for the offer, Alice! I'm interested, but that price is a bit high for me. How about we settle at a lower price?
I understand you're looking for a better price, but I've already discounted it significantly from my initial offer. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit.
I appreciate you meeting me halfway, Alice. I'm getting closer to your price, but it's still a bit of a stretch for my budget. Could you do $95?
I'm glad you're getting closer to my price, Bob! I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to make sure I'm not losing too much profit. I can do $115, but that's as low as I can go.
Alice, I appreciate you working with me.  $100 is the absolute highest I can go.  What do you say?
I've already discounted the price significantly, Bob. I'm not sure I can go any lower than $110. I'm willing to meet you at this price, but I'm not going to go any lower.
